| HistoryText             = The Crane Daughters are the children of the [[Crane Mother (Earth-616)|Crane Mother]] the ruler of  [[K'un-Zi]]. The Crane Mother has given birth to thousand of daughters of the centuries, but can only give birth to a son the [[Crane Champion (Earth-616)|Crane Champion]] every 300 years. They are all trained in K'un-Zi martial arts. Together they can merge into a giant Crane.{{r|Immortal Iron Fist #8}}

With the death of the Crane Champion they recruit the [[Davos (Earth-616)|Steel Phoenix]] to take revenge against [[Orson Randall (Earth-616)|Iron Fist (Orson Randall)]]. They sacrificed their [[Glossary:Chi|Chi]] to the Steel Phoenix to enhance his powers, with the Crane Mother sending more daughters whenever they ran out.{{r|Immortal Iron Fist #1}}{{r|Immortal Iron Fist #4}}
